title: Add site-wide top banner promoting ANC Apprentice Program Center with Calendly link and Appointment Dashboard53 button

requirements.text: Add a site-wide promotional banner across the very top of the app (above the existing sticky header navigation) that displays the exact message: "We have a startup assistance program called ANC Apprentice Program Center if your interested set an appointment today at : https://calendly.com/anc-electronics-n-services". The banner must include a clickable link to https://calendly.com/anc-electronics-n-services (open in a new tab).

quotes: Also advertise in a banner across the top , "We have a startup assistance program called ANC Apprentice Program Center if your interested set an appointment today at : " https://calendly.com/anc-electronics-n-services"

acceptanceCriteria: On every route, a top-of-page banner appears above the current sticky header in Layout.
The banner renders the provided text in English exactly as supplied, including the Calendly URL.
The Calendly URL in the banner is clickable and opens https://calendly.com/anc-electronics-n-services in a new tab/window with safe rel attributes (noopener/noreferrer).
The banner remains readable on mobile and does not break the existing header layout (nav, login, menus).

requirements.text: Add a button directly below the banner advertisement (as part of the same top-of-page banner area) labeled exactly: "Connect with the appointment dashboard53". When clicked, it must navigate the user to a new in-app page/route for the appointment dashboard ("Appointment Dashboard53").

quotes: and put a button below that ad to connect with the appointment dashboard53

acceptanceCriteria: A button labeled exactly "Connect with the appointment dashboard53" appears directly below the banner ad copy in the top banner area.
Clicking the button routes to an in-app page for the appointment dashboard (e.g., a new route added to the router), without a full page reload.
The button is usable on mobile and desktop and remains visible even when the sticky header is present.

requirements.text: Create the "Appointment Dashboard53" page/route and render an embedded view of the Calendly scheduling page https://calendly.com/anc-electronics-n-services (e.g., via an iframe) along with a clear external-link fallback that opens the same URL in a new tab.
acceptanceCriteria: A new route exists for the Appointment Dashboard53 page and can be reached via the banner button.
The page displays an embedded Calendly view for https://calendly.com/anc-electronics-n-services.
The page includes an explicit external-link fallback to open https://calendly.com/anc-electronics-n-services in a new tab with rel=noopener/noreferrer.
Navigating back to other routes works normally and the global Layout remains consistent.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components must be composed, not modified).

Do not modify the immutable hook files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Keep all changes within the existing React + TanStack Router structure (Layout is the root route component).
nonGoals: Do not add or change backend/Motoko functionality for this request.
Do not add third-party authentication or external API integrations beyond linking/embedding the provided Calendly URL.
